tags.name: AVM - We're moving to the Attomized AVM! New customers refer to the Attomized AVM API call below.

tags: AVM - We're moving to the Attomized AVM! New customers refer to the Attomized AVM API call below.
get.summary: Returns AVM details within a geography.
get.description: Get a list of AVM snapshot records that fall within an GeoID with a specific value range. Use propertytpe to select a specific property type for your search.

parameters.name: geoid
parameters.description: A list of geographies that this property belongs to. These geoIDs are used by search engine and values should not be exposed to the public

parameters.name: minavmvalue
parameters.description: This represents the estimated low value for the property

parameters.name: maxavmvalue
parameters.description: This represents the estimated max value for the property

parameters.name: propertytype
parameters.description: A specific property classification such as 'Detached Single Family'

200.description: list of avm snapshots based on GeoID

tags: AVM - We're moving to the Attomized AVM! New customers refer to the Attomized AVM API call below.
get.summary: Returns AVM details for a property.
get.description: Get AVM details for a specific address.

parameters.name: address1
parameters.description: The first line of the property address

parameters.name: address2
parameters.description: The second line of the property address

200.description: list of AVM detail record for a specific address
